text: Mata arrā wa, anata gata no tame ni sōzō nasa reta mono de hikage o tsukuri, yamayama ni hinan no basho o mōke, mata anata gata no tame ni, shonetsu o fusegu ifuku to, bōryoku kara anata gata o mamoru i o, sadame rareta. Kare ga kono yō ni anata gata ni taishi onkei o nashitoge rareru no mo, kitto anata gataga arrā (no ishi) ni fukujū, kie surukaradearu
